comments.body: Do you want to include /dev/bots/download_goldctl.sh, /packages/flutter_goldens, etc?  Or will this goldens.version always be bumped with those changes?

For now, it'll always bump. :) 
I would like to keep a close eye on it while changing over to the new system that won't use this anymore.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@# Use git ls-files '<pattern>' without a / prefix to see the list of matching files.

/bin/internal/goldens.version @Piinks
/CODEOWNERS @jmagman
/packages/flutter_tools/templates/module/ios/ @jmagman
